parameters.name: v-correlation-id
parameters.description: Unique transaction Id. Will be generated if not provided and returned in response headers.

externalRefId.description: A unique GUID generated by POST resource, used for retrieving and updating a deal. Do not send in the request, API will always generate one and assign it to the deal.

guarantors.description: Guarantor information. A guarantor is the person whose credit report will be pulled during the underwriting process.

salesAgent.description: The agent who is submitting the deal.

installationContact.description: The Technical Agent who is going to do setup.

routeToSalesRep.description: Used to route a application to a worldpay or partner sales rep. By default the API is configured to route to a Worldpay sales rep. If you would like to route to partner (Launchpad UI) please work with your implementation consultant.

dbaName.description: The merchant name they do business as.  Generally with what their customers know the business.

legalName.description: Business Legal Name as filed with the IRS.

ownershipType.description: Required. OwnershipType defines the type of the Merchant Organization, and drives the requirements for data collections of beneficial and control owners under U.S. Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN).

mccCode.description: SIC Code / MCC Code (Merchant Category Code) is the code use to describe what the merchant is selling. Use MCC look up call to search valid codes, with sort and long description to find the MCC that most closely matches what the merchant is selling.

businessEstablishedDate.description: Date (CCYY-MM-DD) on which the merchant's business was established.

websiteUrl.description: The URL of the merchant's website.

federalTaxId.description: The Federal Tax ID is the business Tax Identification Number (TIN) or Employer Identification Number (EIN). If the business is a sole proprietor they may use the social security number of the sole proprietor.

paymentAcceptanceMethod.description: The ways in which the business is accepting payments. Multiple options may be selected. 'In person', would be card present at a brick and mortar store, 'onlinesite' would be card not present use on an ecommerce website, and 'phoneormailorder' would be card not present used for mail and telephone orders.

pciadc.description: Indication if the merchant has had an account data compromise.

pcidssValidated.description: Indictor showing if the merchant is compliant or not with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards.

surroundingArea.description: Type of area surroundning the business.

productServiceSold.description: Type of goods or services sold.

ownAddYears.description: Years the business has been operating in their current location.

activeMonths.description: The months during which the business is actively operating.

warranty.description: Does the business offer warranties, dues, subscriptions, memberships, or other extended services?

acceptCreditCards.description: Does the business accept credit cards?

percentRetailSwipedTransactions.description: Projected Percentage of daily card-present transactions.

acceptChargebacks.description: Do you have more than 25 chargeback accepted in the last 12 months?

chargebackPercent.description:
Projected chargeback percentage.

```Required when acceptChargebacks is 'Yes'```

```Optional when acceptChargebacks is null or 'No'.```

returnPercent.description: Projected return percent of  goods sold

cardNotPresentPercent.description: Percent of card not present transactions.

annualCreditSalesVolume.description: Projected annual credit card sales volume.

annualDebitSalesVolume.description: Projected annual debit card sales volume.

annualAmexVolume.description: Projected annual Amex volume. ``` This field is required when you opt-in for Amex ```

amexAverageTicket.description:
AverageTicket dollar amount for Amex.
 ```This field is required when you opt-in for Amex```

averageNumberofDays.description: Average number of days from when cardholder is charged & when products or services are received IN FULL by cardholder.

Owner.description: A Control Owner is required for the following ownership types > LLC, PARTNERSHIP, PRIVATE CORPORATION, ASSOCIATION/ESTATE/TRUST, NON-PROFIT

type.description: The Owner Type. Please note the above Ownership Types where a Control Owner is required.

title.description: Required for AMEX acquired merchants otherwise optional.

firstName.description: First name. Region based validations will be applied to this field.

lastName.description: Last name. Region based validations will be applied to this field.

phoneNumberExt.description: Phone number extension. Up to 8 digits of the format 12345678.

alternatePhone.description: 10-digit alternate phone number of the format  5131234567.

email.description: Email address of the contact. Must have @ and a .

ssn.description: Social security number. Do not include dashes.

dob.description: Date of Birth (CCYY-MM-DD). Must be at least 18 years old.

addressLine1.description: Address Line 1. Field for house number, street and direction.

addressLine2.description: Address Line 2. Field for apartment or suite numbers, etc.

state.description: Valid US state, commonwealth, and territory codes are allowed.

postalCode.description: Postal code / zip code. The postal code must be valid for the address' country code.

postalCodeExtension.description: Postal code / zip code extension.  The postal code extension must be valid for the address' country code.

identification.description: Optional. If any attribute in the identification object is populated then at least idNumber and idType are required.

idType.description: Type of ID provided by the owner.

issuedCity.description: City in which ID was issued.

issuedState.description: Valid state code where ID was issued.

title.description: Required for AMEX acquired merchants otherwise optional.

firstName.description: First name. Region based validations will be applied to this field.

lastName.description: Last name. Region based validations will be applied to this field.

phoneNumberExt.description: Phone number extension. Up to 8 digits of the format 12345678.

alternatePhone.description: 10-digit alternate phone number of the format  5131234567.

email.description: Email address of the contact. Must have @ and a .

ssn.description: Social security number. Do not include dashes.

dob.description: Date of Birth (CCYY-MM-DD). Must be at least 18 years old.

addressLine1.description: Address Line 1. Field for house number, street and direction.

addressLine2.description: Address Line 2. Field for apartment or suite numbers, etc.

state.description: Valid US state, commonwealth, and territory codes are allowed.

postalCode.description: Postal code / zip code. The postal code must be valid for the address' country code.

postalCodeExtension.description: Postal code / zip code extension.  The postal code extension must be valid for the address' country code.

identification.description: Optional. If any attribute in the identification object is populated then at least idNumber and idType are required.

roleName.description:
The role of the signer. Please note the below.

 1) Merchant role name is mandatory.
 2) Required fields indicated in schema are those required for all role names other than "SalesRep"
 3) The "SalesRep" role name only requires the following fields > roleName, signingExperience, signingOrder, firstName, lastName, email
 4) The "Signer2" role name is for a Personal Guarantor. This signer must be included if a Personal Guarantor is on the application. Include the Guarnator's information in this object.

signingOrder.description: Define the signing order for multiple signers

title.description: Required for AMEX acquired merchants otherwise optional.

firstName.description: First name. Region based validations will be applied to this field.

lastName.description: Last name. Region based validations will be applied to this field.

state.description: Valid US state, commonwealth, and territory codes are allowed.

postalCode.description: Postal code / zip code. The postal code must be valid for the address' country code.

postalCodeExtension.description: Postal code / zip code extension.  The postal code extension must be valid for the address' country code.

identification.description: Optional. If any attribute in the identification object is populated then at least idNumber and idType are required.

type.description:
Type of merchant contact.   
 1) Only primary contact
      is mandatory. May be the same as any owner contact information. 
 2) For primary contact, firstName, lastName, phoneNumber and email are mandatory during POST.  
 3) For all other contact types, firstName and lastName are mandatory during POST.

title.description: Required for AMEX acquired merchants otherwise optional.

firstName.description: First name. Region based validations will be applied to this field.

email.description: Email address of the contact. Must have @ and a .

type.description:
Address Type  
 1) Physical address is mandatory.
 2) If equipment needs to be sent to a different location than the physical address, then shipping address should be added.
3) For any address type, addressLine1, city, state, postalCode and country are mandatory.

customizationId.description: Customization Id is internally populated from a master list.

useProductMatrix.description: Whether or not used in product matrix

customizationMinValue.description: Minimum Value. Only applicable if the customization value is a number

charactersAllowed.description: All characters allowed for customization. Only applicable if the customization value is a string.

regex.description: Regular expression to validate the customization value

multiMerchantFlag.description: Applicable in a multiple merchant situation

shortDescription.description: short description of the customization code

longDescription.description: long description of the customization code

shippingOption.description: The speed you would like the equipment to be shipped.

requestId.description: Partner assigned unique request ID for terminal setup.

terminalModel.description: The model name of the terminal in use.

paymentMethod.description: Payment method for the selected terminal.

isVar.description: The value added reseller. Default value is false.

leaseId.description: Lease ID. Required when PaymentMethod is selected as lease.

terminalSequenceNumber.description: Terminal sequence number. If not sent, the API will autogenerate a number.

specialCustomizations.description: Any customization request for a terminal configuration.

productName.description: Payment method associated with the internally-populated ID.

  - 9999999999.99."

vendorId.description: Vendor ID for the payment application.

lastUpgradeDate.description: Last date payment application was upgraded.

Gateway.description: A gateway is a hosted payment processing application provided by a service provider and accessed through an internet connection.

A unique GUID generated by POST resource, used for retrieving and updating a deal. Do not send in the request, API will always generate one and assign it to the deal.

firstName.description: First name. Region based validations will be applied to this field.

lastName.description: Last name. Region based validations will be applied to this field.

email.description: Email address of the contact. Must have @ and a .

externalRefId.description: A unique GUID generated by POST resource, used for retrieving and updating a deal. Do not send in the request, API will always generate one and assign it to the deal.

returnUrl.description: The recipient will be directed to the returnUrl once signing is complete. For example on how it looks:  https://docusign.com/Signing/StartInSession.aspx?t=7f0d21a4-2798-402f-8b26-b12dbb37ae40

embeddingUrl.description: UI embeded link of the Docusign contract for the externalRefId.

status.description: UP or DOWN status of Lauchpad & it's downstream system.
